Class MongoDBEntityContextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.spi.BaseContext
      • org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.spi.BaseEntityContext<E,P>

          • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb.options.navigation.impl.MongoDBEntityContextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentStoreEntityContext<MongoDBEntityContext,MongoDBPropertyContext>, MongoDBEntityContext, EntityContext<MongoDBEntityContext,MongoDBPropertyContext>

    public abstract class MongoDBEntityContextImpl
extends BaseDocumentStoreEntityContext<MongoDBEntityContext,MongoDBPropertyContext>
implements MongoDBEntityContext
    Converts MongoDB entity-level options.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto <davide@hibernate.org>, Gunnar Morling

      • writeConcern

        public MongoDBEntityContext writeConcern(com.mongodb.WriteConcern writeConcern)
        Description copied from interface: MongoDBEntityContext
        Specifies a custom WriteConcern implementation to be applied when performing write operations for the current entity. Either use this option or MongoDBEntityContext.writeConcern(WriteConcernType) but not both at the same type.
        Specified by:
        writeConcern in interface MongoDBEntityContext
        Parameters:
        writeConcern - the write concern
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations

      • associationDocumentStorage

        public MongoDBEntityContext associationDocumentStorage(AssociationDocumentStorageType associationDocumentStorage)
        Description copied from interface: MongoDBEntityContext
        Specifies how association documents should be persisted. Only applies when the association storage strategy is set to AssociationStorageType.ASSOCIATION_DOCUMENT.
        Specified by:
        associationDocumentStorage in interface MongoDBEntityContext
        Parameters:
        associationDocumentStorage - the association document type to be used when not configured the property level
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
